statements: SELECT * FROM behavior_patterns
SELECT id, behavior_type FROM behavior_patterns WHERE target_name = 'Alice'
SELECT pattern_description FROM behavior_patterns WHERE id = 1
SELECT * FROM behavior_patterns ORDER BY target_name ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM behavior_patterns
SELECT * FROM behavior_patterns WHERE behavior_type = 'Aggressive';
SELECT target_name, pattern_description FROM behavior_patterns WHERE id = 1;
SELECT DISTINCT behavior_type FROM behavior_patterns ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT target_name, behavior_type, pattern_description FROM behavior_patterns WHERE id > 3 ORDER BY target_name ASC, id DESC;
SELECT * FROM behavior_patterns WHERE pattern_description LIKE '%pattern%';
SELECT * FROM targets;
SELECT name, email, age FROM targets WHERE age > 30;
SELECT behavior_type, behavior_description FROM behaviors ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT name, location FROM targets WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT target_id, email FROM targets WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT * FROM targets WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT name, email FROM targets WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT behavior_type, behavior_description FROM behaviors WHERE behavior_id < 10 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT target_id, name, email, location FROM targets WHERE name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY target_id
SELECT * FROM behaviors ORDER BY behavior_id ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM behavior_patterns;
SELECT target_id, pattern_type FROM behavior_patterns ORDER BY pattern_type DESC;
SELECT target_id, behavior_description FROM behavior_patterns WHERE target_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM persuasive_messages WHERE target_id = 10;
SELECT message_id, message_text FROM persuasive_messages WHERE target_id = 15 ORDER BY message_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM behavior_patterns ORDER BY target_id DESC;
SELECT pattern_type, behavior_description FROM behavior_patterns WHERE pattern_type = 'Phishing';
SELECT message_text, target_id FROM persuasive_messages WHERE target_id IN (SELECT target_id FROM behavior_patterns WHERE pattern_type = 'Malware');
SELECT campaign_name, end_date FROM social_engineering_campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT behavior_description FROM behavior_patterns WHERE pattern_type LIKE '%Social Engineering%' ORDER BY target_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM target_profiles;
SELECT target_id, name, email FROM target_profiles ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT target_id, birthday FROM target_profiles WHERE birthday > '1990-01-01';
SELECT target_id, pattern_name, pattern_description FROM behavior_patterns WHERE target_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT target_id, campaign_id, activity_type FROM campaign_activity WHERE activity_timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM target_profiles WHERE target_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM target_profiles WHERE birthday < '2000-01-01'
SELECT * FROM message_history WHERE message_id IN ('123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001', '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002')
SELECT pattern_id, pattern_name FROM behavior_patterns ORDER BY pattern_name DESC
SELECT target_id, COUNT(DISTINCT campaign_id) AS total_campaigns FROM campaign_activity GROUP BY target_id HAVING total_campaigns > 3
SELECT * FROM targets;
SELECT name, email FROM targets WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT id, phone_number FROM targets WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM behaviors ORDER BY behavior_date DESC;
SELECT target_id, behavior_type, behavior_description FROM behaviors WHERE behavior_type = 'Click';
SELECT * FROM targets;
SELECT name, email, location FROM targets WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM behaviors WHERE behavior_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY behavior_date DESC;
SELECT target_id, behavior_type, behavior_description FROM behaviors WHERE behavior_type = 'Positive' LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date ASC, end_date DESC;
